meanings.definition: relating to or suffering from anoxemia
meanings.sent1: The anoxemic patient needed immediate oxygen therapy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the anoxemic condition in the patient.
meanings.sent3: The anoxemic teddy bear needed a tiny oxygen mask to feel better.
meanings.sent4: The anoxemic sky seemed to gasp for a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The anoxemic flowers wilted without enough oxygen to thrive.

meanings.sent1: The anoxemic environment made it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The anoxemic atmosphere in the room was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The anoxemic joke sucked the laughter out of the room.
meanings.sent4: The anoxemic silence hung heavy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The anoxemic music left the audience breathless with emotion.

meanings.sent1: The anoxemic water was unable to support marine life.
meanings.sent2: The anoxemic air at high altitudes can be dangerous.
meanings.sent3: The anoxemic balloon struggled to stay afloat in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The anoxemic fire sputtered and struggled to burn.
meanings.sent5: The anoxemic room felt stale and suffocating.
